page.title: 14Heybridge and Shopping
page.content: In our survey nobody who lives in Heybridge does their main weekly shopping there. This is because there are no shops or supermarkets of any real size. Instead residents have to shop in other towns. Results : Maldon 68% Chelmsford/Springfield 28% Colchester 8% In the future, however, this may change because there are plans to convert the now disused{Bentall's}site into a large shopping precinct housing the complete needs of the locality. In our survey, when asked, "Do you think that Bentall's site should become a shopping precinct?", 83% said Yes. Of the 17% that did not want a precinct some had businesses in Maldon or Heybridge which they thought would be adversely affected and others did not want the extra traffic it might bring.
